    • Method Detail

      • login

        User login(java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password)
        logins the current user and returns the user data, or null if login failed
        Parameters:
        username - username already registered by user
        password - plain text password of user, encryption is done at mongodb level
        Returns:
        User data or null if login fails

      • login

        User login(User toLog)
        logins the current user and returns the user data, or null if login failed
        Parameters:
        toLog - user to log, with AT LEAST USERNAME and PASSWORD set
        Returns:
        User data or null if login fails

      • register

        boolean register(User toRegister)
        registers a user into the system
        Parameters:
        toRegister - User to add to the system
        Returns:
        true if user is correctly added

      • changeEmail

        boolean changeEmail(User target,
                    java.lang.String newEmail)
        changes email to a user
        Parameters:
        target - user we want to change email
        newEmail - new email to set
        Returns:
        true if email is correctly updated

      • changePassword

        boolean changePassword(User target,
                       java.lang.String newPassword)
        changes password to a user
        Parameters:
        target - user we want to change password
        newPassword - new encrypted password to set
        Returns:
        true if password is correctly updated

      • changeCountry

        boolean changeCountry(User target,
                      java.lang.String newCountry)
        changes country to a user
        Parameters:
        target - user we want to change country
        newCountry - new encrypted country to set
        Returns:
        true if country is correctly updated

      • removeUser

        boolean removeUser(User target)
        removes an user from the system
        Parameters:
        target - user to eliminate (at least username must be set)
        Returns:
        true if user is removed correctly

      • removeUser

        boolean removeUser(java.lang.String username)
        removes an user from the system
        Parameters:
        username - username of the user to eliminate
        Returns:
        true if user is removed correctly

      • verifyOldPassword

        boolean verifyOldPassword(User involved,
                          java.lang.String password)
        Compares the password of a User object with the one memorized on DB
        Parameters:
        involved - user to which compare password
        password - PLAIN TEXT password to compare with the encrypted one stored in db
        Returns:
        true if password are equal

      • changeTeamName

        boolean changeTeamName(User involved,
                       java.lang.String newName)
        Changes the name of the team associated to a user
        Parameters:
        involved - User that own the team
        newName - name of the team
        Returns:
        true if the name is correctly updated

      • updatePoints

        boolean updatePoints(User target,
                     double points)
        Updates a user's points
        Parameters:
        target - User whose points are updated
        points - new Value of target's points
        Returns:
        true if points are successfully updated

      • updateNumberOfPokeball

        boolean updateNumberOfPokeball(User target)
        updates number of daily Pokeball of the user, for cheat-prevention
        Parameters:
        target - user to update
        Returns:
        true if update is successful

      • updateNumberOfPokeballTo10

        boolean updateNumberOfPokeballTo10(User target)
        restores the default value of the available Pokeball for the target user
        Parameters:
        target - user to update
        Returns:
        true if update is successful

      • decrementPokeball

        boolean decrementPokeball(User target)
        decrements by 1 the number of Pokeball associated to the target user
        Parameters:
        target - user to update
        Returns:
        true if update is successful

      • logout

        void logout(User toLogOut)
        logouts the user from the system
        Parameters:
        toLogOut - user to logout

      • getEveryUser

        java.util.ArrayList<User> getEveryUser()
        gets every user in the database
        Returns:
        a list of users
